CustomField.description:
No longer used as of 1/31/2025. Formula variant of the Campaign Type field that standardizes the category to a few select values for reporting.
In System Use: Fields: First Campaign Category, Most Recent Campaign Category, Flow: 'Campaign - After Save Automations - V1' (inactive)
External Systems Utilization: None
CustomField.formula: CASE( Type, "Email","Marketing - Outbound", "Webinar - Live","Marketing - Event", "Webinar - CS", "Scale Customer Success", "Programmatic Outreach", "Scale Customer Success", "Demo Request","Marketing - Demo Request", "Inbound Chat","Product", "Direct Inquiry","Marketing - Paid/Direct", "Sponsored Podcast","Marketing - Paid/Direct", "Live Event - Retool Hosted","Marketing - Event", "Live Event - Tradeshow","Marketing - Event", "Content Download","Marketing - Paid/Direct", "Webinar - Recorded","Marketing - Event", "Sign up","Product", "Trial Sign up","Product", "Trial Sign up - SSOP", "Product", "Product Non-Action", "Product", "Product Action","Product", "In-App Feature Gate","Product", "Sales Outbound - SDR", "Sales - SDR Outbound", "Sales Outbound - AE", "Sales - AE Outbound", "Sales Outbound - CSM", "Sales - Success Outbound", "Referral - Current Retool User", "Referral", "Referral - Former Retool User", "Referral", "Referral - Retool Employee Personal Referral", "Referral", "Referral - Retool Customer Success Referral", "Referral", "ABM","Marketing - Paid/Direct", "N/A")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Standardizes the Campaign Type field into a few select values for reporting.
CustomField.label: zOLDCampaign Category
